articles.title: Rapid Test Kits Launched for Early Detection of HIV, HCV and Syphilis | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: The test kits are expected to be available at hospitals and labs by the end of this month.
articles.content: After launching Indias first test kit for Tuberculosis and multidrug-resistant Tuberculosis late last year, Pune-based Mylab Discovery Solutions has come out with three new rapid kits for the early d… [+1233 chars]
